prompt_metadata.purpose: Generate organizational chart image for SwagStack GmbH

prompts.detailed_prompt: Create a clean, professional organizational chart for a company called 'SwagStack GmbH'. The chart should have a modern corporate design with a hierarchical tree structure. Use a minimalist aesthetic with soft gradients, rounded rectangles for each role box, and subtle connecting lines. Include placeholder positions: CEO at the top, with CTO, CFO, and COO reporting directly below. Under CTO show Engineering Lead and Product Lead. Under CFO show Finance Manager and HR Manager. Under COO show Operations Manager and Sales Lead. Each box should contain the role title and a placeholder for the person's name. Use a professional color palette with navy blue (#1e3a5f) as primary color and light gray (#f5f7fa) background. Add the company logo placeholder at the top. Style: corporate, clean, infographic quality.
prompts.midjourney_optimized: /imagine prompt: Professional organizational chart infographic for SwagStack GmbH, hierarchical tree structure, CEO at top with C-suite executives below (CTO, CFO, COO), department heads underneath, modern minimalist corporate design, navy blue and white color scheme, rounded rectangle boxes connected by elegant lines, clean typography, business presentation quality, vector style illustration, 16:9 aspect ratio --ar 16:9 --style raw --v 6
prompts.dalle_optimized: A professional, clean organizational chart for 'SwagStack GmbH' displayed as a hierarchical tree diagram. Modern corporate infographic style with a white background. The CEO position at the top in a navy blue rounded rectangle, connected by subtle gray lines to three C-level positions below (CTO, CFO, COO) in slightly smaller boxes. Each C-level has 2 department heads reporting to them shown in even smaller boxes. Use a consistent navy blue (#1e3a5f) and teal (#2dd4bf) color palette. Include subtle drop shadows for depth. Professional business presentation quality. High resolution, crisp lines, readable placeholder text.
